General.Name: PSK HOLDINGS Inc
General.Description: PSK HOLDINGS Inc. manufactures and sells semiconductor manufacturing and flat panel display equipment worldwide. It offers descum and surface treatment solution for semiconductor packaging industry; and hot DI water equipment used in semiconductor wet cleaning process, as well as technology for fluxless reflow process. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Hwaseong-si, South Korea.

5.Name: Mr. Yong-Hee  Jung
5.Title: Sr. Managing Director, Head of Marketing Department & Director
